Negative_Review: You should be aware that there is a wide difference in the apartments and that the fifth floor the units are much smaller and lack charm There is nothing wrong with them but the lower floors have grace and opulence Book a lower floor if that is important to you
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Small second bedroom Wifi did not function well after 10 pm
Positive_Review: Excellent location within a five minute walk of the city centre Staff on the whole were very pleasant and helpful Beautiful period building well divided into rooms and apartments

Negative_Review: Room did not meet expectations based on previous reviews and description Furniture was equivalent to what you d find in a US college dorm room Walls were bare no artwork on any walls in the unit and 3 of 4 walls were white no color Overall room was overpriced given these shortfalls Sounds like other units may be outfitted more extravagantly
Positive_Review: Unique hotel in Inner Stadt We had a Classic Studio with 2 beds and a kitchenette Room was spacious and a c worked great considering Vienna was in the midst of a heat wave Friendly receptionist helped us check in Off the tourist area so very quiet Charming elevator

beautifully stylistic room with little extras like the coffee machine extras in the bathroom and an antique looking lift loved the staircase leading up to the room was really is like something from a movie set in the 1930s inside was more than adequately contemporary

Very nice and clean hotel Loved the rooftop pool Modern well thought out furnishings kitchenette and bathroom It was very comfortable for our family of four Restaurants stores and most conveniences all around the quiet block We walked to tourist attractions we also took taxis which were very affordable The staff was very nice treated us well and was helpful I would stay there again

Negative_Review: Would have been great to have an iron in the room but you could get one from reception Not the biggest issue
Positive_Review: Great location just behind Stephansplatz but still quiet Lots of room for a family kitchen was small but very useful with fridge toaster MW stove and kettle Restaurants close by were good staff very friendly Definitely stay there again

Negative_Review: Daily WIFI interruptions Strange Airconditioning machine with long tube through the window and very loud Safty box Safe did not work and has not been fixed during my stay
Positive_Review: good location big apartment

The location was excellent in a pretty section of the old city just a few blocks from St Stephensdom the city park and so many other sights and restaurants Our room was pretty comfortable and full of sunlight The staff was helpful The breakfast basket at our door was one of my favorite things

Really great deal on a last minute booking The front staff was great and rooms were above my expectations In fact I recommend taking a few better pictures because they don t do the rooms justice Awesome

Great location clean and spacious room equipped with modern and quality facilities friendly and helpful staff and the Superior Studio is terrific by the way Will choose here again if visiting Vienna next time

Negative_Review: Second bedroom was very small and our apartment needed more mirrors as although there were some you could not dry your hair in front of them as there was no plug sockets near them
Positive_Review: Beautiful apartment with good facilities in a great location

Our rooms two rooms with a dining area were comfortable The location is good walking distance to most of the places We have a tiny kitchen and dining table outside of the room It is convenient to have a coffee or something in the room

Negative_Review: Room was very hot at night as we were on 5th floor top Evening temperature over 25 degrees and air conditioning not effective enough
Positive_Review: Nice room and bathroom with kitchenette with central location in Vienna

Negative_Review: The internet was terrible If I had to rate the room with internet it would be below a 9 because it was very important to me that they had working internet I asked the reception at night if he could fix it but he said they couldn t do anything about it and I mentioned it to the receptionist in the morning and she said they had no complaints I was the complaint Everything else was great but if you need good wifi you won t get it here
Positive_Review: The rooms were very spacious and they have a kitchen with all the necessary utensils and supplies Beds and staff were extremely friendly They even leave chocolate and free water Def would recommend this place to a family Also it s location is great Few blocks from city center and literally ten mins walk from everything else

This was our first trip to Vienna and came at the end of a wonderful two week vacation I am so glad we booked this property A few minutes walk to cafes the stadtpark and stephansplatz Beautifully furnished spacious family suite for my husband myself and our two adult children Friendly knowledgeable staff at reception and checkout We will definitely book here again Highly highly recommend

Negative_Review: The last day WIFI stoped working
Positive_Review: Very spacious apartment great location great facilities Well equipped kitchen with coffee maker tea kuttle toaster good size fridge We were very happy about coffee and tea provided Super clean apartment 100 The location of the apartment was great Just a minute away from Stephens square but on a very quiet street Lots of great restaurants just a minute away We really enjoyed staying at this hotel apartment I would highly recommend it

Negative_Review: the kids room is very little and not near the parents room
Positive_Review: the hosting was very good very friendly staff the hotel is near all the attraction in the center of the city we recommend this hotel

The facilities were excellent It was more like an apartment so a main bedroom and a smaller single bedroom plus a kitchen area Great to have a proper coffee machine in the room The location is excellent and next door to the best restaurant we found in Vienna Puerstner Doesn t look much from the street but wait until you go inside A lovely period building steeped in character but with modern facilities Would definitely use this Hotel again

The apartment was immaculately clean We asked for a quiet apartment and was offered one It is conveniently located in centre and is close to a Bio supermarket full of premium quality organic food The staff have been truly helpful and they have helped in booking concert tickets cruise and train ticket recommending good restaurants We were also impressed that the apartment was thoroughly cleaned and prepared daily whilst some other apartment hotels we have stayed only clean once a week or per visit Small details were also looked after such as chocolate were left every day on our pillow We would definitely like to come back and stay in this elegant clean centre apartment hotel if we visit Vienna again

Negative_Review: We were 3 older couples so one bedroom was very tiny with another couple on a pull out in the livingroom Not the best but it was fine
Positive_Review: Can walk everywhere

Negative_Review: check in took 35 minutes as there was only one recepcionist and she had to handle about 8 different calls while checking us in
Positive_Review: Good location the best choice for a night out with friends

Negative_Review: There was a scaffolding near my apartment window At 6 30 am they started banging Every 20 minutes after I was woken up by banging or crashes I had a meeting at 10am I was exhausted
Positive_Review: I love the property The staff are friendly the rooms are great and the location is perfect
staff was amazing and the room was one of the best rooms I ve ever stayed in I travel quite a bit I was upgraded which was a lovely surprise I will definitely come here again if I m ever in Vienna
Spacious very clean The place is safe comfortable just 5 7 min from St Stephen Cathedral Stuff is super friendly I am panning to sty there again next time I am in Vienna

Negative_Review: At the moment it is more an apartment than a hotel although reception is 24 hours open The breakfast under request was OK but did not meet all our expectation
Positive_Review: Location is excellent and the apartment gives the possibility for simple cooking
Excellent location both from CAT terminal train from airport and to central Vienna Lovely premises Great place for weekend break Lots of good restaurants nearby

Negative_Review: Beds are 2 singles pushed together to make a double bed Not really comfortable when you want to cuddle with your husband or partner Beds are also a little bit too firm for me
Positive_Review: Service oriented staff Beautiful old lift Free working wi fi Rooms are big and clean I was upgraded to an even bigger room with a separate receiving area and kitchenette Location is about 5 minutes walk to Stefan s Cathedral and to Stubentor underground station The price is very friendly

Negative_Review: The kitchen area in 531 was a bit small compared to the kitchen when we last stayed in July 2016 when there was a table in the Kitchen area
Positive_Review: We have stayed before The location is excellent Handy for the city center the concert halls and the CAT from the airport Very good restaurants within walking distance and the Jazz Club

Beautiful appartments very clean and tidy Located in central Vienna a short 5 minute walk to the city centre No cafe in the building however there are many cafes within a short walk Many restaurants nearby as well Wifi worked perfect

I got an upgrade to my room sorry it wasnt a room it was a huge apartment nice bathtub Staffs were really helpful Hotel location was great within five minutes you get to St Stephen s Cathedral and Stephenplatz and National Opera House

The location is great It is close to most of the things to see and do in the city The decor of the apartment is great The building is beautiful old Vienna This is our second stay at this facility We recommend it and we will be back

Negative_Review: The wifi drops out constantly that s a little annoying
Positive_Review: Lovely apartment well appointed in a great location Lots of cafes bars and restaurants just out the door

Negative_Review: I booked expecting an apartment hotel but it is really just a series of unrelated rooms apartments in a building It has none of the usual facilities such as a foyer bar cafe etc and each time we needed to contact reception it was a different very young person each of whom was very pleasant and obliging but there was no possibility of consistency or follow up On our second day we reported that the shower was not draining properly and we ended each shower with water up to our ankles which then took about fifteen minutes to drain away but nothing was done The internet service was interrupted without notice apparently for maintenance and the unit didn t have a DVD player as advertised when we first moved in Also the range of cooking utensils was fairly limited We had to be quite creative to get some meals cooked These aren t major problems and overall we did enjoy our stay
Positive_Review: Location was excellent Second bathroom was very useful

The location was perfect Everything was close by and within easy walking distance We met 3 different staff members and each of them were extremely helpful Would stay there again Loved the large spacious colourful rooms

Negative_Review: WiFi was working only a few minutes
Positive_Review: The location is great a few minutes to the center The garage is cheep and close to the hotel The staff was very friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: A proper double bed and large duvet would have been preferable instead of 2 singles and single duvets
Positive_Review: Excellent location well appointed nice and warm Didn t cook much at all really except breakfast simple Spar shop nearby Well equipped for simple self catering Would happily stay again Wiebels Wirsthaus nearby superb for serious eating
Excellent location Very good bright and cosy room with facilities including kitchen coffee making with free coffee pods fridge microwave etc

Negative_Review: Wi Fi authorization could be less annoying however it s acceptable in current form Really nothing else to mention here
Positive_Review: Rich room equipment excellent service nice historical building old style elevator small gifts every day

The staff at this hotel was the highlight of our stay We booked this last minute and it was double booked They were able to offer us a solution and they were incredibly apologetic about the whole situation for 2 days The place is nice and clean as well as tastefully decorated I would definitely stay there again It was a great location It was close to the center of action but far away enough to be on a quiet street

The apartment was in a terrific location in close proximity to St Stephans cathedral yet off of the main road so it was very quiet at night The apartment was very clean and it was so nice having it serviced everyday we appreciated that the apartment was cleaned daily and chocolates were left on our pillows We enjoyed our stay very much
Great location friendly staff clean and comfortable big rooms We stayed at family studio for 3 people and it was great The kitchen full aquipment Defently come again if stay again in VIenna

Negative_Review: I asked for smoking room and it been confirmed but I was shocked that it was non smoking room when arrivel
Positive_Review: Near to the center of Vienna great staff

Negative_Review: We haven t found anything inappropriate or wrong
Positive_Review: Perfect location very nice and comfortable and clean apartments Everything was even better than expected You have there everything you need for daily routine far from home

Everything was just excellent the apartment itself clean spacy and nicely decorated the location in a very heart of Vienna nice welcoming staff all attractions and CAT airport train are in 5 10min walk area Kitchen is fully equipped and many thanks for coffee and tea The building itself is so beautiful imperial style old style elevator high ceilings and spiral staircase We ll definitely come back here again

There was nothing we didn t like we appreciated the little touches like a little gift of chocolate or foot cream left for us each morning The complimentary tea and coffee The quietness and safety of our surroundings Excellent

Negative_Review: You still need to spend that amount of money just for a night for me us that is a lot of money for a night sleep
Positive_Review: In the centre of Wien lovely apparant with a classic elivator like in the movies with

We were upgraded to a lovely two room apartment There was an espresso machine in the room On the second day there were sachets of foot cream on the pillows which were so welcome after a long day trekking around Vienna on foot It s in a great location on a quiet street with shops and restaurants all around Just a ten minute or so walk to St Stephen s Cathedral
An outstanding apartment in a hotel in the perfect location with friendly helpful staff The apartment was stylish elegant spacious and fabulously comfortable We all loved just it a real treat
Location Room facilities Fully equipped kitchen Parking available about 150 m walking distance with charge as mentioned in hotel facilities high recommended for family A c perfect I will come again

Negative_Review: The cleanliness of the apartment wasn t the best I d come back and still find the tissues on the floor and at some point I had one of my dirty towels hung back on the rack as if it was a new towel
Positive_Review: Spacious room great staff

Negative_Review: Had to login in to wifi after returning to the apartment
Positive_Review: All communication before arrival was responsive Everyone was friendly The apartment was clean quiet had free coffee and tea comfortable room a safe in the closet air conditioning good location near a market Wien Mitte train station where train from airport arrives is 10 minute walk near Stephansdom and Stadt Park Wifi was fast

Negative_Review: The checkin is a little tricky since there is no indication of where to go in the building thankfully there was someone entering that could help us The breakfast in the restaurant is a little bit far what can make it bad in a rainy day
Positive_Review: Close to everything you can go everywhere walking near the train station We felt as part of the city The breakfast is excellent

Negative_Review: Wifi disappeared every few minutes meaning we had to keep logging in again with security code Not a huge problem just irritating
Positive_Review: Location is perfect We walked everywhere St Stephens in 5 minutes Hofburg and Spanish Riding School in 12 Museum district in under 20 and even the Belvedere in less than 25 The apartment was compact but with everything we needed and spotlessly clean and cleaned every day Beds extremely comfortable Staff excellent efficient friendly and helpful We would definitely go back

Negative_Review: Obviously in the centre of Vienna it is not possible to park in the streets overnight Car parks exist not too far but are not cheap
Positive_Review: Beautiful spacious and very confortable apartment in the old centre of Vienna so all monuments and museums are at walking distance The bed was very comfortable so we got a good sleep The kitchen area is well furnished for cooking In any case there is a Nespresso machine and a kettle with a variety of coffees and teas to chose from We went there during the hot period of the summer so it was good to have air con in both the bedroom and the lounge kitchen area The air con machines are quite noisy so we let them on when we were out and switched them off when we were in Very good fish restaurant next door and organic supermarket at the end of this small and quiet street so an excellent location in that respect too Staff nice and helpful

Negative_Review: Is it really so hard to setup wifi that doesn t log I off every minute and u need an awkward combo of username and passwords A lot of hotels have this stupid system Just don t do it A regular router would do just fine Rant over
Positive_Review: Very helpful and friendly staff A conflated all our needs

Negative_Review: Breakast served in the room was just okay For breakfast its better to prepare one yourself or go to a nearby cafe
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel is superb It is close to the city centre but on a quiet street with shops and restaurants nearby There is a subway station nearby The staff especially the housekeeping staff is great Clean environment with all amenities including a kitchenette

Negative_Review: Quirky floor alignments in old building Floor sloped but not a problem Near the bathroom entry area there was a slight difference in floor boards levels Took us a couple of days to get used to it so we did not trip Lot of stairs but we were fitter when we left balanced the calories that we consumed Maybe another mirror outside bathroom Two girls one mirtor Need light near fridge Otherwise FABULOUS
Positive_Review: Fantastic location Step out front door to one of the main streets in Vienna Owner Manager very helpful Salzburg is a beautiful city Beautifully renovated modern decor especially the bathroom

Beautiful apartment right in the centre of Vienna We used the park and ride to get rid of the car and cycled everywhere All the advantages of a hotel with daily cleaning but with the independence of self catering

The apartment was well located Only few minutes walk from Stefansplatz The apartment was very clean and well equipped The hotel staff was very friendly There is a reception with somebody reachable 24h A nice place to stay in Vienna center
Just 5 minutes walk from city center and Mitte station Very convenient Calm residential district but there are many nice restaurants and cafes around this apartment hotel We will visit again

Negative_Review: Elevator difficult with bags Internet iffy
Positive_Review: Staff helpful and friendly Good to walk everywhere Maid did our laundry and delivered it the same day Good places to eat nearby Great off sale wine bar next door

Negative_Review: Nothing or perhaps the price Very good but not cheap
Positive_Review: Very nicely located spacious and very well equipped flat very clean Helpful and welcoming desk staff nice and efficient cleaning staff Convenient parking facilities

Negative_Review: short fly of stairs inside the room makes it a bit of a hazard but fine for young people certainly not for seniors
Positive_Review: we book the room in a discount offer and it was by far the best value for money room in Vienna Even without discount the value of the self contained room with kitchenette was superb

Negative_Review: Since they have coffee machine would have been nice to have some milk or single use creamers
Positive_Review: Big and comfortable great to have separate room for the kids kitchen well stocked very central location

Negative_Review: Wifi kept dropping out staff explained that this was because the weather was hot and the house was old No views at all we looked out on walls Second bedroom very hot But these are minor niggles as it was lovely otherwise
Positive_Review: Location location location Excellent situation right in the heart of old Vienna Cafes close by and a supermarket at the end of the street Well furnished and equipped Extremely helpful and pleasant staff always on hand to assist with any issues Highly recommended and we would return
Excellent location lots of room for a family to spread out plenty of character Loved having a little kitchen and the beautiful glass elevator
Beautiful apartment with excellent facilities The only thing missing for a long stay is washing machine Very near to shopping district while located in a quiet street with lots of supermarkets nearby
Comfort of the room including silent AC coffee expression machine with free coffee and tee real kitchen in case you want to cook this in a very quiet and still central location

Negative_Review: We we re in a studio apartment in the part of the building that was extension top floor Consequently it was modern without the beautiful windows decoration of the lower floors shown on the website The windows were small square high up so there wasn t much looking out There is no breakfast room the linked caf is a couple of blocks away The lift is old pretty but slow in peak times
Positive_Review: The kitchenette was handy because it allowed us to buy cereals fruit at the nearby healthfood shop have breakfast before we went out Everything worked the beds were comfortable It is close to many of Vienna s attractions many restaurants the subway

Everyday housekeeping was very good everything you need tea coffee capsules tablets for dishwasher fresh kitchen and bath towels toiletries etc was always supplied and moreover every day a candy or even a foot cream tester were put on our pillows Ii is an expensive hotel but you pay not only for the location but for an excellent service as well

Negative_Review: Pillow was very uncomfortable room was too hot unless have aircon on overnight
Positive_Review: Shower was very good Room was nice and big kitchen was well stocked with utensils etc

Negative_Review: I did not like that breakfast voucher was not included No consideration given for arriving a day late due to circumstances out our controll although I made certain to contact office and informed them of BA late flight cancellation Coffee machine was a bit difficult to use
Positive_Review: I liked the fact that my young adult daughter had her own space Reception personnel was courteous and informative Linen was good Location was great easy walk to St Stephen Cathedral and to the main park

Negative_Review: Reception being behind closed locked door on Mezzanine level meant it was necessary to to stop off at arrival and departure with our suitcases Microwave available but no microwave dish Pots pans available but no lids
Positive_Review: Friendly Service Cleanliness Location

Negative_Review: Wifi keeps disconnecting Every time my phone is locked Had to key in user id and password
Positive_Review: Great location and apartment very well maintained every day Friendly staff

Negative_Review: A few minor issues that can t spoil a great impression about the hotel Wi fi could have been better it is very slow and hardly covers a half of a huge apartment Separate mattresses are not at all good for a loving couple If you try to give your wife a hug you ll end up on a hard bed Breakfast doesn t worth taking Next time I stay there I ll have a breakfast in one of a hundred cafes nearby Breakfast is not in the hotel itself you have to walk a few minutes to the cafe where it s served
Positive_Review: Next time we come to Vienna we ll definitely stay in the same hotel The apartment was very nice it looks much better than pictures that are posted on Booking Very spacious apartment Great location Well equipped kitchen Good restaurant next door good wine bar next door to the other side Good bio grocery store a hundred meters from the hotel

Negative_Review: Bathroom extremely difficult to take a shower no physical space to turn around getting flooded every time you try to take one Bed really awful 2 single ones put together that go aside every time you move totally unacceptable for a couple Portable aircon that just take place
Positive_Review: Excellent location great service spacious rooms

Negative_Review: Washing machine in the apartment would have really helped
Positive_Review: The warmth hospitality promptness to queries apartment itself and of course the location
Everything is perfect The real apartment is better than shown on the advertised photos We had a very pleasant stay Staffs are so helpful and nice

Negative_Review: as for an apartment a self laundry facility might be nice to have although they provide some laundry service with a reasonable price
Positive_Review: excellent location historical nice building heartfelt hospitality

Beautifully done up heritage property with a perfect blend of the old and the new Staff was extra helpful kitchen was well stocked and duvets were to die for Best of all grocery store round the corner a lovely AIDA for breakfast tons of restaurants and it was 10 mins walk to Stephansplaz What else can one ask for

The location was excellent and the beautiful high ceilings and airy light rooms were wonderful it felt luxurious The staff were friendly and helpful The apartment helped make this one of the best city trips we have had

Negative_Review: Nothing negative to say And you can trust my assessment as I am very picky for hotels and know Vienna very well as I have lived there many years
Positive_Review: A very nice and large flat 40m2 very well equipped comfortable bed beautiful bathroom very conveniently located in the centre of Vienna and with parking facilities nearby

The staff were very friendly and helpful The hotel was very clean Beds comfortable everything you needed in the room Chocolates on your pillow were a nice touch In a perfect location would definitely recommend Vienna was the most beautiful place we have ever visited

Negative_Review: The garden is good but we cannot enter because of locking already
Positive_Review: My family enjoy the nice hotel so much We cook by myself The way to the old town is not far

Location close to the trainstation and also to the city center Wonderful apartment building beautiful and very large room They gave us a free upgrade It was our second stay there and we will definitely return again
Early access to the room discounted price for car parking and really lovely helpful staff Perfect location in the heart of Vienna Room bath tab and coffee machine in room made it nice experience

Negative_Review: room overheated central heating broken but not aware change room and back without compensation for trouble smell of paint
Positive_Review: location perfect close to interesting surroundings close to lots of nice tea rooms

Negative_Review: The furnishings were looking a little worn We needed to ask for flatter pillows which wasn t an issue for the hotel but meant we had an uncomfortable first night The supplied pillows really were incredibly uncomfortable
Positive_Review: This apartment was huge and well appointed The building is magnificent and captures the feel of old Vienna

Negative_Review: The third bedroom had two single beds and hardly had any room to put bags Lift was old and small and when we did not have luggage we tended to use the stairs
Positive_Review: Good Location We had six people The main bedroom was very generous The second room was a lounge room with pull out sofa and that was good The hotel staff were very helpful with sight seeing and local restaurants to try Apartment had two bathrooms which was great with the six of us Local Restaurant recommended was great However a Venetian restaurant we attended about 1 2 blocks away on tourist brochure was overpriced and the food was not great either and the waiter was very rude and arrogant We would stay at the apartment again T

Negative_Review: Another front desk staff didn t tell the taxi driver where to go and the driver didn t speak English so it took time to depart hotel the meter went up and paid higher than average fee
Positive_Review: Lady at the front desk was very kind and she helped us with booking a concert etc Delicious chocolates cookies every day maybe before christmas Comfortable and really good location close to Stephanzplatz and also nice restaurants

Negative_Review: The reception was poor When we rang the door bell the receptionist did not inform us where to go for checking in She simply unlock the door We went into the hallway and searched the entire ground floor looking for the check in counter but found none Finally went out and rang the receptionist again and was then told that the check in was on the 1st floor No assistance to help with your luggages We had to managed the luggages with the small elevator After check in we had to manage the luggages again to go up to our apartment on the 4th floor Again no assistance from the establishment On the eve of my check out I saw a mother struggling with her two younger children and several large suitcases in and out of the elevator No assistance whatsoever from the establishment I strongly urged those with luggages and younger children to look elsewhere
Positive_Review: Everything except what I didn t like

Negative_Review: Grown up sized kids had to sleep on a foldable couch one bathroom one toilet so this time the appartement was more of a huge one for two persons than a big one for four There are real for four ones as well if you are lucky to catch them
Positive_Review: If you are tired of being in hotels an being with the crowd this is perfect We have been here about five times it is always like arriving home to a nice turn of the century home in the center of Vienna

Negative_Review: The apartment didn t have any particular view just to the space in between other buildings but it was light so it didn t bother us at all
Positive_Review: We had a great stay central yet quiet location clean and comfortable apartment good facilities friendly staff I would definitely recommend it to others

Negative_Review: air condition made strange dripping noise the first night but thank goodness stopped on its own so the rest of the stay was fine
Positive_Review: lovely appartement in perfect location

Negative_Review: The hotel does not have available rooms booked they have a malfunction They have tried to offer a lower rooms attic We don t accepted and we had to pay most 200 eur for another room We paid cash the room and the hotel took the money on my card This is miserable hotel and personal
Positive_Review: Nothing

Booked a Family Studio and Studio Both rooms are spacious and clean There is an additional small room in the Family studio without air con Fully equipped kitchen appliances which includes Nespresso machine with complimentary coffee capsules and a variety of tea bags Toiletries of good quality Reception staff was helpful in providing information

Negative_Review: Everything was fine nothing we didn t like
Positive_Review: Spacious clean and well equipped apartment Quiet location but very convenient for metro and restaurants etc

Negative_Review: apartment not too clean and both corridor and small kitchen smelt of recent cooking by others not very pleasant
Positive_Review: great location and very helpful reception for parking on street and garage Lovely old lift in classical building and good size apartment for two people and very quiet courtyard views

Negative_Review: i got lost a bit when i got to the hotel as i went in there was no recepetion and there was no sign that recepetion was one floor up so i had to take the elevator the price kinda expensive for their rooms
Positive_Review: Fast wifi fast check in even at late night i bought metero tickets from the recepetion friendly staff helped me with all my questions the location is good and safe and close to all the important attractions i recommend it for all type of travelers

Negative_Review: 1 Air conditioning is improper in some rooms 2 Only one lift and very old 3 Rooms windows are high No good views 4 Rooms closing system is very old only one key for each room 5 Difference in ground level in some rooms makes uncomfortable movement 6 Cars parking is not in the same building about 300 meters away 7 No Room Service or breakfast
Positive_Review: 1 The location 2 Internet service
Quiet but great location walking distance to everything Kitchen was great saved money doing own breakfast drinks etc Loved that we were staying within an apartment with locals

Negative_Review: Floor AC window units work well to cool rooms but take up floor space in the small living room
Positive_Review: Location is excellent just a few short blocks from St Stephens Hofburg palace museums shopping Large parking garage 2 blocks away Several great cafes and winebars on the same block as the hotel Supermarket just down the corner from the hotel Our one bedroom apartment was comfortable and clean with very large bedroom The living room space is cramped with the pullout couch but adequate especially for a family with young children Kitchen is well stocked and includes Nespresso machine Clean bathroom with amenities and daily maid service Elevator and wifi both worked well we had no issues
Outstanding Wonderful staff Lovely apartment Clean and welcoming Fantastic location Really wonderful
Even though it s like an hotel apartment it s cleaned everyday Staff is very friendly and it s in the heart of Vienna great location
The Staff
Location excellent and very secure for family
Location comfort and cleanness
Wonderful stay walking distance to everything Ver friendly and helpful staff

Negative_Review: Pillows too big but not a deal breaker

Excellent location I d recommend to all my friends who have kids to stay here I super enjoyed the stay

Negative_Review: The second room was too small
